entry.title: 23rd October | ğŸƒ Halloween Update
entry.summary: Server announcement for the 2025 Halloween event â€” featuring custom dungeons, haunted graveyards, flying pumpkin drones, and more!
entry.content:
ğŸƒ HALLOWEEN UPDATE & CUSTOM SPOOKINESS ğŸƒ

The servers are going offline for Facepunch's Halloween updateâ€¦ but beware, our own terrors await when you log back in! ğŸ‘»

Hey survivors! ğŸ‘»

The time has comeâ€¦ Facepunch's annual Halloween update is here!
Our servers will be going offline shortly for a mandatory update and restart to bring in all the official Halloween goodness.

But that's not allâ€”
When the lights come back on (or rather, when the fog rolls in ğŸ˜ˆ)â€¦ you'll find we've added our own horrifying twists to make this year's haunt extra deadly!

ğŸƒ OUR HALLOWEEN ADDITIONS ğŸƒ

ğŸ’€ Fully Revamped Dungeons

Each level now features a unique spooky theme, with bosses boasting improved loot drops for those daring enough to descend into the darkness.

ğŸƒ New Locked Crate Event â€“ Radtown

A fresh event awaits: hack a locked crate while waves of flying pumpkin drones try to obliterate it (and you). Defend it if you can - the rewards are worth the fright!

ğŸª¦ Graveyards (Night Only)

When darkness falls, graveyards rise. Hunt the undead and loot the treasures they guard... if you survive till dawn.

ğŸ‘ï¸ Even More Spooky Surprises

We've tucked a few extra chills and thrills around the worldâ€”some sweet, some sinister. Keep your eyes peeledâ€¦ and your weapon loaded.

ğŸ•¯ï¸ So grab your flashlights, polish your pumpkins, and prepare to scream.
The servers will be back soonâ€”and when they are, Halloween truly begins. ğŸŒ•

See you on the other sideâ€¦ if you make it back. ğŸ’€

entry.title: 16th October | ğŸ—’ï¸ Wipe & Changelog
entry.summary: Map wipe announcement and detailed changelog for October 16, 2025 â€” including quest fixes, loot balance, new kits, and plugin improvements.
entry.content:
ğŸ§­ What has Wiped?

  • This is a map wipe only â€” blueprints, XP, and Prestige remain.
  • Multiple systems updated to improve quest rewards, loot balance, and plugin stability.

ğŸ§¾ General Notes

  • This is a map wipe only.
  • Blueprints, XP, and Prestige remain untouched.
  • Several systems received backend improvements for reward balancing and plugin performance.

ğŸ“œ Quests

  • Fixed quests that didnâ€™t reset on wipe.
  • Added Basic & Advanced Blueprint Fragments to starter and Tier 2 Quartermaster quest rewards.
  • Yellow barrels now count towards â€œBarrel Basher.â€
  • Adjusted XP reward for â€œThings seem to have gottenâ€¦ out of handâ€ from 150k XP â†’ 1.5m XP.

ğŸ³ Cooking

  • Added Blueprint Fragments and Tarp to the blacklist for:

    • Duplicator Buff
    • Crafting Refund Buff

ğŸŒ³ Skill Tree

  • Added Blueprint Fragments and Planters to blacklist on:

    • Duplicator
    • Thrift Tinkerer

  • Strike Command changes:

    • Reduced radius: 60m â†’ 15m
    • Reduced prevention timer: 30m â†’ 5m
  • Reworded Prestige Menu for clarity and validation.
  • Fixed Wild Collectables and resource gathering accuracy.

ğŸ Loot Tables

  • Added Basic Blueprint Frags to:

    • Junkpile Scientists
    • Brown Crates
    • Barrels

  • Added Advanced Blueprint Frags to:

    • Military Crates
    • Elite Crates
    • Locked Crates
  • Removed broken RP coins and replaced with the correct item.

ğŸ›’ ShoppyStock

  • RP coins changed from Research Paper to Sticks.
  • RP in your inventory can now be spent directly â€” no deposit required.
  • Predator Missile per-purchase multiplier reduced: 1.5 â†’ 0.2.

ğŸŒ€ Portals

  • Updated for R3 and W6 (active on Production).
  • 3 new worlds added per region, going live shortly after or with wipe.

ğŸ Kits

  • Added new Prestige Kits (requires matching perk):

    • /kit predator â†’ 5 Predator Missiles
    • /kit terminal â†’ 1 Terminal, 10 Wireless Adaptors, 6 Tier 1 Cells
    • /kit bear â†’ 1 Teddy Bear
    • /kit portgun â†’ 1 Teleport Gun, 16x Scope, 50 HV 5.56 Rounds
  • Overhauled Kit UI to match /info and /quests.

ğŸ° Casino

  • Changed RP item to restore RP betting functionality.

ğŸŒ¿ Global Limits

  • Added 6 Plant Pot limit (for decorations).
  • Implemented improved validation to prevent duping and bypasses.

ğŸ§© Terminal Plugin

  • Fixed issue where storage adapters could vanish when interacting nearby.

ğŸ“¦ Portable Locker

  • Fixed several NREs preventing functionality on multiple servers.

ğŸ‘¥ Teams

  • Added blacklist for offensive team names.

  • New commands for players:

    • /teams create <name> - Create a new team
    • /teams invite <player> - Invite another player
    • /teams accept - Accept a pending invite
    • /teams kick <player> - Remove player (leader only)
    • /teams leave - Leave your team
    • /teams disband - Disband your team

ğŸ’¥ Predator Missile

  • Now functions correctly on raid islands.
  • Increased damage output â€” â€œhits like a truck.â€

â„¹ï¸ /info Updates

  • Added Britâ€™s Golden AK.
  • Added Aceâ€™s Python.
  • Added Gathering Sets.
  • Adjusted Legendary Heli timer to correct 2-hour duration.

âœ… Final Notes

All systems validated for the upcoming wipe. Expect smoother performance, balanced progression, and improved QoL across all servers.

entry.title: 2nd October | ğŸš€ Wipe & Major Questline Update
entry.summary: Map wipe announcement and detailed changelog for October 2, 2025 â€” featuring new questlines, boss rework, loot rebalance, and economy improvements.
entry.content:
ğŸ§­ What has Wiped?

  • This is a map wipe only â€” blueprints, XP, and Prestige remain.
  • Major focus on new questlines â€” grind them early for maximum rewards!
  • Boss fights, loot tables, and economy systems have been completely overhauled.

ğŸ§¾ General Notes

  • This is a map wipe only.
  • Blueprints, XP, and Prestige remain untouched.
  • Main focus: New questlines â€” race to complete them first!

ğŸ“œ NEW QUESTLINES

ğŸ¯ Major Addition: Two brand new questlines to conquer this wipe!

  • Quartermaster â€“ Sulfur
    • 5 Tiers (T1-T5)
    • Progressive sulfur-based challenges
    • Unlock powerful rewards as you advance
  • The Boom God Questline
    • All-new explosive-themed quest series
    • Test your raiding and explosive skills
    • Exclusive rewards for completion
Pro Tip: Start these questlines early â€” first completions get bragging rights!

ğŸ‰ Boss & Events

  • Boss Fight
    • Completely reworked mechanics
    • Improved difficulty scaling
    • Better loot distribution
  • Legendary Heli
    • Loot table rebalanced
    • Reduced battery drops (fewer batteries = better variety)
    • Improved reward quality

ğŸ’° Loot & Economy

  • RP (Reward Points)
    • Stack size increased: 10,000 â†’ 1,000,000
    • RP Coins now drop in loot tables
    • Easier to manage large amounts of currency
  • Blueprint Fragments
    • New item added to progression system
    • Found in various loot sources
  • Casino Changes
    • Scrap Box removed from Casino perk
    • Better reward balancing
  • Boss Loot
    • Complete rework of drop tables
    • More balanced and rewarding

âš™ï¸ Stability & Performance

  • Sync Plugins Reworked
    • Smoother cross-server node transfers
    • Reduced lag during world hopping
    • Improved data synchronization
  • Backend optimizations for better server performance
  • Enhanced stability across all systems

ğŸ† The Challenge

This wipe is all about the NEW QUESTLINES â€” who's conquering them first?

Race to complete the Quartermaster and Boom God questlines. Show off your progress in Discord and claim your bragging rights! ğŸ¯

ğŸ® Good Luck, Survivors!

Get out there and start grinding those new questlines. ğŸ’ª
